properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT C.CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL_STATUS CS JOIN CHALL C ON(CS.CHALL_NO=C.CHALL_NO) WHERE CS.USER_ID = ? AND CS.CHALL_STATUS != 0)A WHERE A.STATUS =2

SELECT RNUM , USER_ID , CHALL_NO , CHALL_STATUS , JOIN_CALL_DATE , CHALL_TITLE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_START ,CHALL_PERIOD , CATE_NAME , CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) END_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, CE.* FROM(SELECT CS.USER_ID, CHALL_NO, CS.CHALL_STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE, CHALL_TITLE, FILE_PATH, CHALL_PERIOD,CATE_NAME, CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL_STATUS CS JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING(CATE_ID) WHERE CS.USER_ID = ? AND CS.CHALL_STATUS != 0 ORDER BY STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE DESC)CE WHERE STATUS = 2) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHALL C JOIN CHALL_STATUS S USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE C_HITS = 'Y' AND S.USER_ID = ?

SELECT RNUM , USER_ID , CHALL_NO , CHALL_STATUS , JOIN_CALL_DATE , CHALL_TITLE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_START ,CHALL_PERIOD , CATE_NAME , C_HITS , CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) END_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, CE.* FROM(SELECT CS.USER_ID, CHALL_NO, CS.CHALL_STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE, CHALL_TITLE, FILE_PATH, CHALL_PERIOD,CATE_NAME, C_HITS, CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL_STATUS CS JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING(CATE_ID) WHERE CS.USER_ID = ? ORDER BY STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE DESC)CE WHERE C_HITS='Y') WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT C.CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL_STATUS CS JOIN CHALL C ON(CS.CHALL_NO=C.CHALL_NO) WHERE CS.USER_ID = ? AND CS.CHALL_STATUS != 0)A WHERE A.STATUS =1

SELECT RNUM , USER_ID , CHALL_NO , CHALL_STATUS , JOIN_CALL_DATE , CHALL_TITLE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_START ,CHALL_PERIOD , CATE_NAME , CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) END_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, CE.* FROM(SELECT CS.USER_ID, CHALL_NO, CS.CHALL_STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE, CHALL_TITLE, FILE_PATH, CHALL_PERIOD,CATE_NAME, CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL_STATUS CS JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING(CATE_ID) WHERE CS.USER_ID = ? AND CS.CHALL_STATUS != 0 ORDER BY STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE DESC)CE WHERE STATUS = 1) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT USER_ID , CHALL_NO , CHALL_STATUS , JOIN_CALL_DATE , C_HITS FROM CHALL_STATUS WHERE CHALL_NO = ? AND USER_ID = ?
SELECT C_HITS FROM CHALL_STATUS WHERE USER_ID = ? AND CHALL_NO = ?
UPDATE CHALL_STATUS SET C_HITS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = ? AND CHALL_NO = ? AND C_HITS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL CH JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING (CATE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_ID = CH.USER_ID) JOIN CHALL_STATUS CS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID = ?)A WHERE A.STATUS =2 AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,CHALL_START) <=3

SELECT RNUM, CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL CH JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING (CATE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_ID = CH.USER_ID) JOIN CHALL_STATUS CS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID = ?)A WHERE STATUS = 2)C WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,CHALL_START) < =3

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL CH JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING (CATE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_ID = CH.USER_ID) JOIN CHALL_STATUS CS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID = ?)A WHERE A.STATUS =2 AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,CHALL_START) <=6

SELECT RNUM, CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL CH JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING (CATE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_ID = CH.USER_ID) JOIN CHALL_STATUS CS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID = ?)A WHERE STATUS = 2)C WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,CHALL_START) < =6

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL CH JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING (CATE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_ID = CH.USER_ID) JOIN CHALL_STATUS CS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID = ?)A WHERE A.STATUS =2 AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,CHALL_START) <=12

SELECT RNUM, CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL CH JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING (CATE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_ID = CH.USER_ID) JOIN CHALL_STATUS CS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID = ?)A WHERE STATUS = 2)C WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,CHALL_START) < =12
